text: “Ndipo tidamlembera m’mapale (m’masileti) maphunziro aulaliki wa mtundu uliwonse wofotokoza chinthu chilichonse: “Choncho, atenge mwa mphamvu ndi kuwalamulira anthu ako kuti awagwire mwa ubwino wake. Posachedwapa ndidzakusonyezani midzi ya oipa oswa malamulo athu (momwe idaonongekera. Ndipo ndikulowetsani inu m’menemo).”
